LANDSCAPING DESIGN MELBOURNE

Periwinkle Garden Design & Creation believes that a garden should not only be visually stunning, but also serve as your own little sanctuary, a place to relax and escape, a garden you love to be in.

OVER 15 YEARS EXPERIENCE

With experience comes wisdom and over the years there is little that we haven't seen, done or learned and overcome.

TRANSPARENT COSTS

At Periwinkle our pricing is completely transparent, what you see is what you get- We operate on an hourly rate and keep you updated on our progress daily, keeping the costs down and honest. And at the end of the job, we'll give you an itemised, day-by-day invoice.

WHY CHOOSE US?

GARDENS DESIGNED FOR YOU

We believe that the design of your garden needs to fit your needs. We are more than happy to sit down with you and work out all the elements necessary to give you a garden you love to be in.

COMPLETE RANGE OF SERVICES

We can provide everything you need to rejuvenate your outdoor space, from initial inspiration and design, to planting, paving, decking, retaining walls, water features and even outdoor rooms. We can create edible gardens, or sensory gardens using permaculture principles and much more.

Whenever she spends time in our garden, she moves a few plants here, cuts a few back there, finds a pot to place in just the right spot and the results are transformative.
